General.Name: Karnalyte Resources Inc.
General.Description: Karnalyte Resources Inc. explores for and develops potash and magnesium products in Canada. The company owns 100% interests in Subsurface Mineral Leases KLSA 010, KL 247A, and KL 246 totaling 367 km2 of mineral rights. It also holds interests in the Wynyard potash project located in Wynyard, Saskatchewan. Karnalyte Resources Inc. was incorporated in 2007 and is headquartered in Saskatoon, Canada.
General.Address: 409 3rd Avenue South, Saskatoon, SK, Canada, S7K 5R5
